channel.title: Invoice Options on PrestaShop Tests
channel.description: Recent content in Invoice Options on PrestaShop Tests

item.title: Enable Disable Invoices
item.description: Enable Disable Invoices Steps Step Description Expected result Go to Orders > “Invoices” page Invoices page is displayed successfully Disable invoices and save the form The invoice is disabled successfully The validation message is displayed successfully “Update successful” Go to Orders > “Orders” page Orders page is displayed successfully Open the fourth-order page Order page is displayed successfully Change the order status to “Shipped” The status is changed successfully

item.title: Enable Disable Tax Breakdown
item.description: Enable Disable Tax Breakdown Steps Step Description Expected result Go to Orders > Invoices" page" Invoices page is displayed successfully Enable tax breakdown and save the form The tax breakdown is enabled successfully. The validation message is displayed successfully Update successful" Go to International > “taxes” page Taxes page is displayed successfully Go to “Tax rules” page The tax rules page is displayed successfully Create new tax rule group.

item.title: Enable Disable Product Image
item.description: Enable Disable Product Image Steps Step Description Expected result Go to Orders > “Invoices” page Invoices page is displayed successfully Enable product image and save the form The product image is enabled successfully The validation message is displayed successfully “Update successful” Open the FO page The home page is opened successfully Add the first product to the cart There is one product in the cart Click on “Proceed to checkout” button The purchase form is displayed correctly Sign in with the default account “pub@prestashop.

item.title: Invoice Prefix
item.description: Invoice Prefix Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Orders > “Invoices” page Invoices page is displayed successfully Set the new prefix and save the form The validation message is displayed successfully “Update successful” Go to Orders > “Orders” page Orders page is displayed successfully Open the first order page Order page is displayed successfully Change the order status to “Shipped” The status is changed successfully

item.title: Enable Disable Current Year
item.description: Enable Disable Current Year Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Orders > “Invoices” page Invoices page is displayed successfully Enable Add current year to invoice number Choose the option After the sequential number and save The validation message is displayed successfully “Update successful” Go to Orders > “Orders” page Orders page is displayed successfully Open the first order page Order page is displayed successfully Change the order status to “Shipped” The status is changed successfully

item.title: Other Options
item.description: Other Options Steps Step Description Expected result Go to Orders > “Invoices” page Invoices page is displayed successfully Set the new invoice number, legal free text, footer text and save the form The validation message is displayed successfully “Update successful” Open the FO page The home page is opened successfully Add the first product to the cart There is one product in the cart Click on “Proceed to checkout” button The purchase form is displayed correctly Sign in with the default account “[pub@prestashop.
